import Mathlib

    Let f : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„ have continuous partial derivatives on a convex set U.
    If the operator norm of the (FrÃ©chet) derivative is bounded by M on U, then

theorem mean_value_inequality_of_bounded_gradient {U : Set (Fin n â†’ â„)}
  {f : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„} {M : â„}
  (hU : Convex â„ U) (hcd : ContDiffOn â„ 1 f U)
  (hM : âˆ€ x âˆˆ U, â€–(fderivWithin â„ f U x : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’L[â„] â„)â€– â‰¤ M) :
  âˆ€ x y âˆˆ U, |f y - f x - (fderivWithin â„ f U x) (y - x)| â‰¤ M * â€–y - xâ€– := by sorry
